description: Modernizing and Upgrading the  Metrological Services of the Great  Socialist  People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriyah.

subproject.description:
output 1: to update and expand the national meteorogical surface and upper-air observation station network.
output 2: to establish and impliment networks of specialised observation stations to cater for the specialized sectors of the socio-economic.
output 3: to take advantage of modern technologies and automate the data processing facilities of the meteorological dept.
output 4: to set up an electronic weather presentation studio to provide a visible output of the meteo dept 
output 5: to procure and install a satelite ground recieving and imaging system for a new generation of METEOSAT satelites 
output 6: to procure and install one weather radar
output 7: to procure and install two (2) integrated Airport Terminal Weather Systems at airports in Libya to better serve the aviation industry.
subproject.title: METEOROLOGY MODERNISATION
